ChangeList.Description: Added the following properties to the [alert](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/alert?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity:  **incidentIds**, [securityResources](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/securityResource?view=graph-rest-1.0) - **resource**, **resourceType**,[networkConnection](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/networkconnection?view=graph-rest-1.0) - **sourceLocation**, **destinationLocation**.

Added [create](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/informationprotection-post-threatassessmentrequests?view=graph-rest-1.0), [get](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/threatassessmentrequest-get?view=graph-rest-1.0) and [list](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/informationprotection-list-threatassessmentrequests?view=graph-rest-1.0) APIs to manage [threatAssessmentRequest](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/threatAssessmentRequest?view=graph-rest-1.0) resources.

The [Update alert](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/alert-update?view=graph-rest-1.0&tabs=http) method now updates the **comments** field with the following values only: **Closed in IPC**, **Closed in MCAS**.
Added the **parent** property to the [informationProtectionLabel](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/informationprotectionlabel?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
